tool_description: Analyzes job requirements and resume content to recommend optimal section ordering and emphasis for maximum impact with target employers.

resume_sections.description: List of current resume sections in order

job_priorities.description: Job requirements in order of importance

career_stage.description: Career stage: new_graduate, early_career, mid_career, senior_professional, executive

industry_norms.description: Industry standard: traditional, modern, creative, or technical

error_messages: Insufficient resume sections: Provide at least 3 resume sections for prioritization analysis.
No job priorities provided: Include at least one job requirement priority.
No applicant strengths provided: Include at least one strength area.
Invalid career stage: Use one of [new_graduate, early_career, mid_career, senior_professional, executive].
Invalid industry norms: Use one of [traditional, modern, creative, technical].
Too many sections: Limit resume sections to 10 for effective prioritization.
Mismatched data: Job priorities and applicant strengths should relate to resume sections provided.
usage: Provide current resume sections, job priorities, and applicant strengths, optionally specify career stage and industry norms. The tool recommends optimal section ordering and emphasis.

emphasis_recommendations.description: Which sections should receive more emphasis

sections_to_expand.description: Sections that should be expanded for this job

sections_to_minimize.description: Sections that could be shortened or de-emphasized

effectiveness_score.description: Predicted effectiveness score of recommended order from 0-100
